titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the House from February 9 to February 16, 1988, and a conditional adjournment of the Senate from February 4 or 5, to February 15, 1988.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/3/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from February 9 until February 16, 1988, and of the Senate from February 4 or 5 until February 15, 1988.
